channel.title: "The Feeling of Power" Review + Spoofed .. Read Please~!
channel.description:
I've been working on English 9A alot recently and I want to give my teacher something good this time. My teacher had me read a story called "The Feeling of Power" written by Isaac Asimov, also the writer of "I, Robot", that is most known as the movie called I, Robot starring Will Smith.
I've written my version of The Feeling of Power, but first you should read the original story.
You'll have to read the stories on seperate websites because the forum said I exceeded the character limit, sorry. :(
Isaac's version (original):
[b]Read the story in html format: [url=http://www.themathlab.com/writings/short%20stories/feeling.htm]The Feeling of Power[/url][/b]
My version (spoofed, etc.):
[b]Read the story in htm format: [url=http://www.geocities.com/gamer4ev3r/story/Feeling_web.htm]The Feeling of Stupidity[/url][/b]
Rate my story please!
I really am going to submit this to my teacher!
~Dizzy

item.title: "The Feeling of Power" Review + Spoofed .. Read Please~!
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Lol, double. You really give me a 8? I didn’t know my story was that good.

Expect me to make alot more stupid stories.

I sorta like to get my “comedy” part of the story from this one book I read about Ninja’s written by Robert Hamburger (he was like 11 when he wrote the book and it’s packed full of mature content, rofl).

Read full topic

item.description:
@jcs_double wrote:

[quote=“Ron, post:5, topic:15497”][quote author=jcs_double link=topic=23108.msg260981#msg260981 date=1158827787]
uuh, I-robot is actually a collection of books wirtten by issac asimov and made into a movie

and for the story 8/10 for the effort
[/quote]

i havent actually read the books i just herd about it when we woere watching i rotbot in programming
Yeah the book was much better than the movie. I saw that movie today by the way. It was entertaining, but not as fun as it could have been.[/quote]

i dident actually read the books i just herd about it when we watched i robot in programming
